definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]

from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
bilateral/both shores/both sides/both coasts/Taiwan and mainland
both ends/both parties to a deal
both ends (of a stick etc)/two extremes
one country, two systems (PRC proposal regarding Hong Kong, Macau and Taiwan)
male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines

sentences.english: Through the trial, was initially arrested the two men and Lim Yang.
sentences.chinese: 通过审讯，最初被抓获的两男子为任某和杨某。

sentences.english: Electric machines are composed of stator and rotor.
sentences.chinese: 电机是由定子和转子两部分构成的。

sentences.english: The artistic achievements of Xiuruji mostly embody two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 《绣襦记》的艺术成就主要体现在两方面。

sentences.english: Sensing food, a roach peers into a two-foot-tall pitcher plant.
sentences.chinese: 发现食物，一只蟑螂仔细观察着两英尺高的猪笼草。

sentences.english: M. and arrive there two hours later.
sentences.chinese: 我们早上六点半就上火车，两小时后到达。

sentences.english: After all, it was nearly the same in both languages, and only two hours beforehand he had been helping to lug my bike about.
sentences.chinese: 而且仅仅在两小时之前他还帮我存放自行车呢。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 随后两国元首共同会见了中智两国和国际传媒记者。

sentences.english: To keep a fresh supply take one or two cloves from each bulb and replant them.
sentences.chinese: 保持新鲜供给要花一至两丁香每个灯泡和补种。

sentences.english: For the first 2-hour block, just do what you'd normally do during that time period.
sentences.chinese: 在头一个两小时的时段里，你按部就班地做事就可以。

sentences.english: At supper she had two huge plates full of lasagna.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭时她吃了两大碗满满当当的肉酱宽面条。
只有两百辆汽车受到影响。

sentences.english: in fact, building sucess is base on the binding of the two .
sentences.chinese: 事实上，成功的确建立在两方面完全融合的基础上。

sentences.english: Results will usually be better than if you spend 2 hours lolly-gagging around the gym. But be warned.
sentences.chinese: 而且效果通常比你在健身房晃荡两小时来得好。

sentences.english: The building consists of two parts as visitor center and rural guest houses.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑分为游客中心和乡村客舍两部分。

sentences.english: If you are in a hurry, we have a two-hour quick service.
sentences.chinese: 如果您急着要，我们有两小时的快速服务。

sentences.english: Even bides such as a quarrel between husband and wife are brought to the peasant association.
sentences.chinese: 连两公婆吵架的小事，也要到农民协会去解决。

definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
two (colloquial equivalent of 兩個|两个)/both/some
up and down/top and bottom/old and new/length/about
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
